item.title: about python logging
item.description: logging basics logging.basicConfig(filename='example.log',level=logging.DEBUG) logging.debug('this is a debug msg') logging.info('this is an info msg') logging.warning('this is a warning msg') recommend reading official tutorial more thinking: how to log from different module in the same log file? it gave me a headache at first. and I tried importing logging module in each module and log in the same file. it works somehow but with issues. an obivious one of them is you are doing a lot of work with the same logic, and it is avoidable.
